TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from people who discovered amazing products with our app.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer! I've found so many cool new products that I never would have known about otherwise.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how this app curates the latest and greatest products from all kinds of categories. It's like having a personal product scout!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether I'm looking for the latest tech, home goods, or even new foods to try, this app always has something exciting to discover.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of cutting-edge products.
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: We'd love to hear from you about new product ideas!
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How did you hear about us?

CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our app that curates the newest and most innovative product releases from across industries. Find your next must-have gadget, fashion item, or lifestyle product with just a few taps.
CTA_SUBTITLE: Explore, Discover, and Shop Cutting-Edge Products
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Your Gateway to the Latest Product Trends
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: ProductFinder is a revolutionary app that helps you discover the latest and greatest products across various categories. Whether you're looking for the newest tech gadget, trendy fashion item, or innovative household product, ProductFinder has got you covered.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app utilizes advanced algorithms and data mining techniques to scour the web for the most recent product launches. We analyze trends, reviews, and customer feedback to curate a personalized feed of the hottest products tailored to your interests and preferences.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Unlike traditional product search engines, ProductFinder goes beyond just listing products. We provide in-depth analysis, comparisons, and expert insights to help you make informed purchasing decisions. Our app is designed to inspire and excite, introducing you to products you never knew existed.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, absolutely! ProductFinder is a free app available for download on both iOS and Android devices. We believe in democratizing access to the latest product innovations, making them accessible to everyone.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge product discovery platform.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about finding new products
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: This app helps you discover exciting new products across different categories like technology, home goods, fashion and more. Stay ahead of the trends!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the app find new products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app uses advanced algorithms to scour the internet for the latest product launches and trending items. We curate the best finds for you.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I filter products by category?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, you can easily filter products based on categories like electronics, clothing, home decor etc. to find exactly what you're looking for.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often is the app updated with new products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Our product database is updated daily to ensure you always have access to the newest releases and buzzworthy items.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, the app is completely free to download and use. We make money through affiliate partnerships when you purchase products you discovered through our app.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Stay Ahead of the Curve with Our Innovative Product Finder
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of the latest and greatest products across various categories.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our intelligent algorithm learns your preferences and suggests products tailored to your unique taste and needs.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Gain valuable insights from our team of product experts who provide in-depth reviews, comparisons, and buying guides.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Explore what's hot and trending in the market, as well as consistently popular products loved by our community.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Enjoy special offers, discounts, and promotions on the latest products, available exclusively to our app users.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Connect with like-minded individuals, share your experiences, and get recommendations from our vibrant community of product enthusiasts.
PERSON_NAME: Welcome, Product Explorer! Discover the latest and greatest innovations with just a few taps. Our app is designed to help you stay ahead of the curve and find the cutting-edge products that match your unique interests and needs.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover the hottest new products before they hit the mainstream.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Uncover the latest innovations and get first dibs on cutting-edge products.
